== salesforce.com set up ==

  # Ensure the target salesforce org has been set up to use Single Sign on
  # Enable "Is Single Sign-On Enabled" option on a profile 
  # Associate the new user with "Is Single Sign-On Enabled" profile 
  # Set Delegated Gateway URL to "https://_your_google_app_.appspot.com/auth" (Setup - Administration Setup - Security Controls - Single Sign-On Setting) 
  # Login into "https://_your_google_app_.appspot.com" 
  # Test it is working by clicking "Login to Salesforce" link
